item.title: EnerSys 10-K
item.description: EnerSys, which is in the Miscellaneous Electrical Machinery, Equipment & Supplies [3690] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 26, 2021 had 38778 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 491 instances company - 428 instances 2020 - 365 instances 2021 - 346 instances 1 - 336 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
